com.camerontec.catalys.server.schedule

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurable
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentHelper
        • com.camerontec.catalys.server.schedule.Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IScheduler, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable

    public final class Scheduler
extends ComponentHelper
implements IScheduler
    Component based implementation of IScheduler.

    openComponent is called automatically in the constructor.

    The scheduler is inactive at start up. Call setSchedulerActive(boolean) or setComponentActive(boolean) to activate it.

      • getNextScheduledTime

        public long getNextScheduledTime(ITimeSpec timeSpec)
        Returns the next scheduled time of the given TimeSpec.

        Value returned is standard milliseconds since 1/1/1970. If the time spec is not currently scheduled, returns -1.

        Specified by:
        getNextScheduledTime in interface IScheduler
        Parameters:
        timeSpec - Time specification to check
        Returns:
        Time of next scheduled event or -1 if none.

      • getScheduledTask

        @Deprecated
public IScheduledTask getScheduledTask(ITask task)
        Deprecated. This method has been deprecated since we can now schedule the same task at different schedules. Use getScheduledTasks() and iterate to find the correct task.
        This method will return the first matching scheduled task.
        Specified by:
        getScheduledTask in interface IScheduler
        Parameters:
        task - a task
        Returns:
        Scheduled instance for given task. May be null.

      • getResolution

        public long getResolution()
        Description copied from interface: IScheduler
        Return the underlying scheduler's resolution.

        When the resolution is greater than zero, the caller must take into account the fact that tasks may be scheduled up to the resolution interval before they are due.

        Specified by:
        getResolution in interface IScheduler
        Returns:
        The underlying scheduler's resolution in milliseconds.

      • isSchedulerActive

        Description copied from interface: IScheduler

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        True if active.

      • setSchedulerActive

        public void setSchedulerActive(boolean active)
                        throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IScheduler
        An inactive scheduler does not run any tasks.

        By default, a scheduler starts up as inactive.

        Specified by:
